mapper.update:
UPDATE data_league_rank_club_guest SET
data_league_rank_club_guest.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
data_league_rank_club_guest.LeagueSubId = #{ leagueSubId },
data_league_rank_club_guest.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_league_rank_club_guest.ClubHistoryId = #{ clubHistoryId },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Round = #{ round },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Wins = #{ wins },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Ties = #{ ties },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Loses = #{ loses },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Goals = #{ goals },
data_league_rank_club_guest.GoalsA = #{ goalsA },
data_league_rank_club_guest.GoalsD = #{ goalsD },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Points = #{ points },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Year = #{ year },
data_league_rank_club_guest.EndYear = #{ endYear },
data_league_rank_club_guest.DisplayOrder = #{ displayOrder },
data_league_rank_club_guest.RankingStatus = #{ rankingStatus },
data_league_rank_club_guest.PreRanking = #{ preRanking },
data_league_rank_club_guest.Ranking = #{ ranking },
data_league_rank_club_guest.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_league_rank_club_guest.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
